definition: dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]

sentences.english: This paper mainly through three parts to introduce the history of dialectic thought of Lukacs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要從三個方面來介紹盧卡奇的歷史辯證法思想。

sentences.english: Alcibiades tries to find the self in a dialectical movement.
sentences.chinese: 阿希比底思設法在辯證法中找到自我。

sentences.english: The most subtle dialectics always end in nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 最爲精巧的辯證法總是結尾於懷舊。

sentences.english: Thus the paper is written in the meta-language of contradictory dialectic explanation.
sentences.chinese: 全文以矛盾辯證法爲元語言展開解釋。

sentences.english: Dialectic studies how opposites can become identical .
sentences.chinese: 辯證法研究對立物是怎樣變統一的。

sentences.english: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism .
sentences.chinese: 要提倡唯物辯證法，反對形而上學和煩瑣哲學。

sentences.english: This is the dialectics in international relations use.
sentences.chinese: 這就是辯證法在國際關係中的運用。

sentences.english: Marcuse regards Marx dialectics as the foundation that its society criticizes theory.
sentences.chinese: 馬爾庫塞把馬克思辯證法當做其社會批判理論的基礎。

sentences.english: You have to go to materialism and dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 你必須採取唯物論和辯證法的方法。

sentences.english: The theory of traditional Chinese medicine has been deeply influenced by classical Chinese materialism and dialectics .
sentences.chinese: 中醫藥學受古代唯物論和辯證法的深刻影響。

sentences.english: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism.
sentences.chinese: 要提倡唯物辯證法，反對形而上學和煩瑣哲學。

sentences.english: Dialectical analyzing the nature of sophism, it is a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 從辯證法上來分析，詭辯的本質是一種謬誤。

sentences.english: The theory of tacit knowledge embodies deep dialectical spirit.
sentences.chinese: 波蘭尼的默會認識理論具有深刻的辯證法內涵。

sentences.english: So the transform of traditional music is the life carrier of the opera and dialectics of life.
sentences.chinese: “舊曲變用”是戲曲音樂生命的載體，生命的辯證法。

sentences.english: The philosophic basis of fuzzy poetics is materialist dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 模糊詩學的哲學基礎是唯物辯證法。

sentences.english: This also is us the dialectics of this times.
sentences.chinese: 這也是我們這個時代的辯證法。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
